Hi,

I'm interested in knowing if anyone out there has experience using 
Haste, the system testing framework developed by atomicobject.com.  I've 
been trying to get it set up but I can't get the sample StoryBook 
(net.bereza.money.gui.BookJBooks) running.  I tried using the build 
script they provide.  Then I tried it in Eclipse.  Both times the code 
compiles fine, but when trying to run I get the following output:

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
com/atomicobject/haste/framework/JVMStoryRunner
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: 
com/atomicobject/haste/framework/JVMStoryRunner
Exception in thread "main"
  *** REPORT ***


OK (2 stories)

I have the relevant import statements, one of which is
import com.atomicobject.haste.framework.JVMStoryRunner;

If anyone out there has been able to successfully utilize Haste could 
they share their experiences?

Omair
